derivation.yuyuan_name: formed irregularly from Greek pakhus 'thick' + anēr, andr- 'male' (with reference to the thick stamens)

means.word_mean: 1. any plant of the genus Pachysandra; low-growing evergreen herbs or subshrubs having dentate leaves and used as ground cover
